content: reading and story telling is such an important part of a young child s life encourage creativity and imagination in your child with puppets during story time the lizard hand puppet is a great stand-alone puppet in your animal collection but is also is based on the children s book alice s adventures in wonderland by lewis carroll bill the lizard is not a prominent role in the famous film but in the classic literature he adds a bit of comic relief this pattern is made in one size fitting children through adults so that parents can play too however it can easily be adjusted by tightening your gauge or going down a hook size if you d like one to fit small children better also it should be noted that this particular hand puppet is made in a different style than most of my front-facing hand puppets this adds an element of creative play for children wanting to immitate the walking of a lizard made in mostly single_crochet basic crochet knowledge is all that s needed being familiar with croching in rnds is helpful and some knowledge of hand sewing pieces together text and images copyright ©2023 by erin greene of ​ekayg​ all rights reserved no pattern may be reproduced or distributed in any form by any method without written permission finished products made from this pattern may be used for sale please credit back to ​ekayg​ please direct any questions about the pattern to my e­mail ​ ekaygcrafts@gmail com​ i will respond as quickly as i am able
